Examples
========

Some examples here:

If your exam is on 2021,6,30, then:

.. code-block:: python

    from examdays import exam

    exam(2021, 6, 30)



Or in Command Line:

.. code-block:: 

    $ examdays 2021 6 20

Output:

.. code-block::

    You still have: 6 days!
    Good Luck! 


With Colour:

.. code-block::

    $ examdays 2021 6 30 YELLOW


Or:

.. code-block::

    $ examdays 2021 6 30 blue
